solution_line_template: 1 week has {days_per_week} days so {first_period_weeks} weeks will have {first_period_weeks}*{days_per_week} = <<{days_per_week}*{first_period_weeks}={days_in_first_period}>>{days_in_first_period} days

The puppy will eat 1/4c three times a day so {food_per_feeding_first_period}*{feedings_per_day_first_period}= <<{food_per_feeding_first_period}*{feedings_per_day_first_period}={cups_per_day_first_period}>>{cups_per_day_first_period} cups per day

The puppy will eat {cups_per_day_first_period} cups of food a day for {days_in_first_period} days for a total of {cups_per_day_first_period}*{days_in_first_period} =<<{cups_per_day_first_period}*{days_in_first_period}={total_food_first_period}>>{total_food_first_period} cups

The puppy will then eat `.5 cup of food twice a day so {food_per_feeding_second_period}*{feedings_per_day_second_period} = <<{food_per_feeding_second_period}*{feedings_per_day_second_period}={cups_per_day_second_period}>>{cups_per_day_second_period} cup per day

The puppy will eat {cups_per_day_second_period} cup of food a day for {days_in_second_period} days for a total of {cups_per_day_second_period}*{days_in_second_period} = <<{cups_per_day_second_period}*{days_in_second_period}={total_food_second_period}>>{total_food_second_period} cups per day

She has already fed him {food_fed_today} cup of food and he will eat {total_food_first_period} cups and another {total_food_second_period} cups for a total of {food_fed_today}+{total_food_first_period}+{total_food_second_period} = <<{food_fed_today}+{total_food_first_period}+{total_food_second_period}={total_food_over_4_weeks}>>{total_food_over_4_weeks} cups of food
